name: simpgntrivd
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wn(wceq(c0, csn(c1))))
-| wi(wa(w0, wceq(c0, csn(c1))), wcel(c2, csimpg))
-| wi(wa(w0, wceq(c0, csn(c1))), wn(wcel(c2, csimpg)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wn(wceq(c0, csn(c1))))
-| wi(wa(w0, wceq(c0, csn(c1))), wcel(c2, csimpg))
-| wi(wa(w0, wceq(c0, csn(c1))), wn(wcel(c2, csimpg)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, wceq(c0, csn(c1))), wcel(c2, csimpg))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, csimpg))
body.pretty:
⊢ ((w0 ∧ c0 = { c1 })→ c2 ∈ SimpGrp)
⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ SimpGrp)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wn(wceq(c0, csn(c1))))
-| wi(wa(w0, wceq(c0, csn(c1))), wn(wcel(c2, csimpg)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, csimpg))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → ¬ c0 = { c1 })
⊣ ((w0 ∧ c0 = { c1 })→ ¬ c2 ∈ SimpGrp)
⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ SimpGrp)

stmt.origin: trivnsimpgd(c2, c0, c1, wa(w0, wceq(c0, csn(c1))))
